backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing certificate records and per-user course enrollments with add, remove, verify, and enrollment query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping deployment-related features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files including components, pages, data modules, and utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide explaining root causes of deployment failures and listing added build configs, deployment scripts, and retry logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining extensive OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme mappings.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point defining metadata, icons, and root container loading the React application.
frontend/scripts/deploy-runner.ts: Node-based deployment orchestrator running build steps with retries, logging, and secret redaction.
frontend/scripts/retry.ts: Reusable exponential‑backoff retry helper with detailed logging and final failure reporting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main app layout, initializes React Query and theme provider, and defines all site routes using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/HeroCodeLines.ts: Displays decorative animated code-like text overlay in the hero section.
frontend/src/components/ScrollToTopOnRou: Listens for route changes and automatically scrolls the page to the top on navigation.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, quick links, legal links, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides the main site header with logo, desktop and mobile navigation, and scroll-to-top behavior on active-route clicks.
frontend/src/components/TextImageCarouse: Implements an image-and-text carousel with autoplay, keyboard navigation, and manual controls.
Displays a top bar with a promo message, contact info, and social media icons.
frontend/src/data/articles.ts: Exports article metadata and full content for use in article listing and detail pages.
frontend/src/data/courses.ts: Defines the Course interface and exports a list of cybersecurity course objects with metadata.
frontend/src/data/galleryImages.ts: Defines GalleryImage type and exports categorized image metadata for courses, articles, and branding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity and invalidates queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that returns whether the user prefers reduced motion using a media query listener.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides enrollment-related React Query hooks to check and update course enrollment through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark cybersecurity themes and custom UI components.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Exports a helper to format numbers as INR currency strings.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides basic validation helpers for required fields and email format.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with values, testimonials, and carousel content about the organization.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays an article's details using route params, with navigation and formatted article content.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of article cards with metadata and images, allowing navigation to individual article pages. Uses article data and router navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CertificateVerificati: Provides a form to verify certificate IDs via a backend actor and shows success or failure states. Handles input validation, mutation state, and reset actions.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation and localStorage-based submission. Also includes social media links and user feedback via toast messages.
frontend/src/pages/CourseDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a selected course and handles enrollment through simulated payment and backend mutation. Supports login checks, payment modal flow, and navigation to success page.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Lists all available courses with brief details and pricing. Each course links to its detailed page for enrollment.
frontend/src/pages/EnrollmentSuccessPage: Displays confirmation details after successful course enrollment, including amount paid and course info. Provides navigation back to course list or the course detail page.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a responsive gallery of images with hover effects and category labels. Uses predefined gallery image data.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component with hero section, course carousel, featured content, and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining data collection, usage, security, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/ResourcesPage.tsx: Displays categorized cybersecurity resources with icons, lists, and a responsible‑use notice.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Static terms and conditions page describing service use, conduct, liability, and policy changes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, components, animations, and plugin setup.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node builds specifying module resolution and included Vite config.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite build config with React plugin, environment variable support, aliases, proxy, and chunk splitting.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, architecture notes, issues, and generated image metadata for an ICP dapp with a Motoko backend and React frontend.
